lead_paragraph: Three Houston police officers followed a Chinese diplomat into a parking garage at the Chinese Consulate and arrested him, the authorities said.
snippet: Three Houston police officers followed a Chinese diplomat into a parking garage at the Chinese Consulate and arrested him, the authorities said.

headline.main: Diplomat’s Arrest in Houston Spurs Complaint From China
headline.print_headline: Diplomat’s Arrest in Houston Spurs Complaint From China
